name: Joanne Koch
description: Dr.Joanne Kochwas the regional director for tech and development and a genetics engineer atBiotechnicainCyberpunk 2077. To say that Biotechnica's scientists are "unscrupulous" would be like sayingYorinobu Arasakais "somewhat famous." But few are as unscrupulous as Joanne Koch, even within the organization. Both inside the laboratory, and outside, she holds few, if any reservations about her work. Whether it is using citizens as her personal test subjects, or putting out hits on fellow employees who threaten her position as the regional director for tech and development at Biotechnica, if...
